1: All of us went to the fun fair.
2:
Father bought brother fancy glasses.
Mother bought me a bright blue cap.
The baby got sugar candy.
3:
On the way home, a very strong wind came.
It blew my cap away.
4: My cap got stuck on a branch of a big old tree.
5:
I cried a lot.
And I did not eat my dinner.
6: Later that night, the moon came up. It looked at my cap in the big old tree.
7:
The moon tried on my cap. It smiled happily.
I had to smile too.
8:
After school the next day, my mother gave me a shiny new red cap.
"The moon sent it," she said.
9:
That night, both the moon and I wore our caps and smiled.
We were happy.
10: Do you think the sun needs a hat?
11: Guess which cap I am wearing today!
